column2: ggplot(hr[MonthlyIncome <= 5000 & TotalWorkingYears <= 5& (JobLevel == 2 |  JobLevel == 1)  & Attrition=="Yes",.N,by=list(Age,YearsAtCompany,EnvironmentSatisfaction,MaritalStatus,WorkLifeBalance )], aes(x="", y=N, group=MaritalStatus, color=MaritalStatus, fill=MaritalStatus)) +
panel.grid  = element_blank())+labs(title = "Work Life Balance Rating(1-4)",y="The Number of Employees moving out of the company")
